table.Name: wcms_EmailInbox
table.Title: #Booking
table.SQL_SELECT_LIST:
declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from wcms_EmailInbox where EmailInbox_SiteID = @siteID AND EmailInbox_Type = 102 { AND EmailInbox_Name <o> @Search:EmailInbox_Name } { AND EmailInbox_From <o> @Search:EmailInbox_From } { AND EmailInbox_Phone <o> @Search:EmailInbox_Phone } )
if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 10 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage
select EmailInbox_ID ,EmailInbox_Name ,EmailInbox_From ,dbo.F_001_FormatDateTime(dateadd(hour,{@TIMEZONE},EmailInbox_Date),1,1) as [EmailInbox_Date] ,EmailInbox_Phone ,dbo.F_001_FormatDateTime(dateadd(hour,{@TIMEZONE},EmailInbox_BookingStart),1,1) as [EmailInbox_BookingStart] ,EmailInbox_BookingDuration ,EmailInbox_DOB ,EmailInbox_Read ,0 as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,EmailInbox_ID ,EmailInbox_Name ,EmailInbox_From ,EmailInbox_Date ,EmailInbox_Phone ,EmailInbox_BookingStart ,EmailInbox_BookingDuration ,EmailInbox_DOB ,EmailInbox_Read from wcms_EmailInbox where EmailInbox_SiteID = @siteID AND EmailInbox_Type = 102 { AND EmailInbox_Name <o> @Search:EmailInbox_Name } { AND EmailInbox_From <o> @Search:EmailInbox_From } { AND EmailInbox_Phone <o> @Search:EmailInbox_Phone } ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
table.SQL_LOAD_EDIT: Update wcms_EmailInbox set [EmailInbox_Read] = 1 where EmailInbox_ID = @editID select [EmailInbox_ID] ,EmailInbox_Name ,EmailInbox_From ,EmailInbox_Date ,EmailInbox_Subject ,EmailInbox_Message ,EmailInbox_Phone ,EmailInbox_Address ,EmailInbox_BookingStart ,EmailInbox_BookingEnd ,EmailInbox_BookingDuration ,EmailInbox_DOB from wcms_EmailInbox where EmailInbox_ID = @editID
table.SQL_UPDATE:
set nocount on declare @id int, @now datetime, @duration int = {@Get:EmailInbox_BookingDuration}, @start datetime = {@Get:EmailInbox_BookingStart}, @end datetime set @id = @editID set @now = getutcdate() set @end = dateadd(minute,@duration,@start)
update wcms_EmailInbox set EmailInbox_Name = {@Get:EmailInbox_Name} ,EmailInbox_From = {@Get:EmailInbox_From} ,EmailInbox_Date = @now ,EmailInbox_Message = {@Get:EmailInbox_Message} ,EmailInbox_Phone = {@Get:EmailInbox_Phone} ,EmailInbox_BookingStart = @start ,EmailInbox_BookingEnd = @end ,EmailInbox_BookingDuration = @duration ,EmailInbox_DOB = {@Get:EmailInbox_DOB} where EmailInbox_ID = @id
select @id
